55105.name: {GDeeper in the Dense Vegetation{x
description: {g
The silence and eeriness of the forests begins to be drown
out by the chirping of birds and the sounds of frogs and
crickets. The smell of baking food becomes more prominent.
You can almost hear the faint noises of children playing.{x

55123.name: {*A Bend in the {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road takes another turn to the west weaving in and out of
the buildings and trees. To the north of this bend there is a
private residence set back away from the road. The yard is
decorated in your typical elven decorum.{x

55100.name: {wA {WB{wroken {WT{wemple{x
description: {g
Once a great marble structure, this temple has been left
decaying over the years and now has turned into an over
grown dense forest ruin. Vines hang down from above in
obscuring the view of what looked to be a monastery room
left with a bed made in marble. This was obviously someone
of some stature that lived here.{x

55153.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
As you leave the city and head north the forest continues
to get dense, as the lights lead you north. Spirits abound
the trail dancing back and forth glowing with light.{x

55234.name: {wA St{*or{wag{*e R{woo{*m{x
description: The musty smell in this chamber is much worse then in the hallway.
The whole room is filled with corpses, bones and skulls are stuffed
in here. Some of the corpses are still wearing robes, blood-red.{x

55232.name: {RP{rr{*ison {RC{ra{*ge{x
description: In this dark room stands a huge iron cage with a large locked
door. A flickering torch hangs next to the wooden door, hardly
{*spreading any light in the room. You can sense something here.{x

55224.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: The main hallway continues further south, slowly slanting. On the
western wall you can see a painting of Hanali in all her beauty.
A small flickering light is visible far south.{x

55115.name: {CEastern end of the S{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: The eastern end of the square leads on further to the east
down what looks to be another well-traveled road. There is
a stream running next to the road here making it somewhat
soggy. In the mud you noticed a large 3-toed footprint with
what looks to be claws on the end of each toe.{x

55230.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: The hallway leads deeper and deeper below the temple. East and west
wooden doors connect the hall with two private chambers. South of
here flickers a small torch.{x

55213.name: {wAlong the Hallway{x
description: Small sculptures  decorate  the hallway
here.  Some small debris  lies here  on
the floor, most likely fallen down from
the ceiling.  The mithril  symbols seem
to be everywhere.  Further to the north
lies  more debris and the hallway makes
a very  sharp turn to  the west  there.{x

55149.name: {*E{wu{Wolen {*l{wu{W' {*a{w'{Wleai {*K{wh{Waliizin{g ({GG{gems and {GR{gare {GS{gtones){x
description: {c
As you enter the glitter from all the glass cases catch your
eyes. It is a precious gem shop. The walls are lined well
above eye level with different gems and other special stones.{x

55106.name: {GO{gutskirts of a {GS{gmall {GT{gown{x
description: {g
In the distance north you can see the small houses and
buildings of a quaint small village. The buildings look of
Elven construction, as do the trial markers leading up to
the edge of the town. Lamps running off of makou light the
way to the village. A path between the trees leads east.{x

55287.name: {wSe{*cr{wet {*Hi{wde{*ou{wt{x
description: As the hallway continues west, more and more bones lie
scattered all over the place. The smell of death permeates
the air. The hallway makes a turn east here, north leads
you back, away from this cursed place.{x

55178.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
As you stroll northward you get an uneasy feeling as if it
is not quite safe to go this far north. The ambiance is
quite tense and danger seems to be watching you right now.{x

55203.name: {wHallway in the Temple{x
description: Far north  the hallway  makes a turn to
the east, a few sculptures decorate it.
The walls  are covered with mithril and
silver symbols.  The ground  is heavily
damaged by  the debris from the ceiling
and  it seems  to be even  worse north.{x

55169.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
The outer wall of the first sanctum still lies scattered about
the ground. Small trees and bones can be seen mixed in-between
the grubble. However none of the bones are human.{x

55269.name: {WA {yY{Ye{wl{Wl{Yo{yw {yM{Ya{Wr{wb{Yl{ye {yA{Yr{Wc{yh{x
description: {gA beautiful arch made of yellow marble stands here, in the shadow
of the large oaks that surround the open spot that can be seen west.
That must be where Azarot lives.  From here you can see a small
cavern, illuminated by candlelight.  A little magical campfire burns
outside.  {x

55217.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n b{wel{*ow {wth{*e T{wem{*pl{we{x
description: A small stairway leads back up to the altar. The dark hallway
leads south to an intersection. This must be the place where
the priests had their chambers.{x

55117.name: {CNorth Eastern end of the S{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: In this corner of the market place, quiet as it may be, a
putrid stench of stables carries through the air. Nobody
seems to be up here for possibly that very reason. However
there is a beautiful garden here. East is the small bank
of this little village.{x

55211.name: {wSharp Turn West{x
description: The  hallway makes a  quite sharp  turn
west here,  deeper  inside the  damaged
temple. A small light seems to burn far
to the  southwest.  Small droplets that
fall  from the  ceiling  can be  heard.{x

55177.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
The cobblestone path stops here, or is so heavily damaged
that it is hard to distinguish it from the other debris. A
terrible force must have been busy, demolishing everything.{x

55235.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: A quite bright flickering torch burns here. Deeper and deeper leads
the hall but to the south it suddenly seems to stop. North leads back
to the temple and the private chambers. {x

55113.name: {CWestern end of the {CS{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: One of the far reaches of the square, the road here leads
further to the west and the cobble stone of the market
square ends. This road still seems like its one of the main
routes of travel.{x

55137.name: {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
Heading further and further away from the market place the
scent of people begins to fade and the wilderness gets
denser and denser around you. In the mud a large 3-toed
footprint is visible.{x

55278.name: {W[{GHOLDING ROOM{W]{x
description: {g
To the east starts a well-traveled cobblestone valley road.
A sign warns you for bandit activity in the mountains east
of here. The edge of the forest of Tru can be seen west.{x

55142.name: {*Elvish Weapon Shop{x
description: {w
The walls are neatly decorated in elvish weaponry, everything
from lances to two-handed ekets. There are even a few items
incrusted with runes. {x

55159.name: {GR{guined {GF{gorest{x
description: {g
{gPillars of the probably once great temple lie about the {x
{gground completely destroyed and unreadable. The travelable {x
{garea is towards the east.{x

55257.name: {yD{Yi{yn{wi{Wng {wR{yo{Yo{ym i{Yn {wa {yC{Ya{wv{We{Yr{yn{x
description: {yIn this cavern stands a simple table with a few candlelights on it.
Two wooden benches stand on either side of the table.  Besides this,
the cave is completely empty.  Deeper in the cavern west is a kitchen.
South leads outside, to a field with a small campfire.  {x

55294.name: {wSe{*cr{wet {*Va{wul{*t{x
description: This vault is almost empty but in the center stands a small chest.
A male skeleton in dark brown leather armor lies close to it, with
an axe in its hand. The lock of the chest seems severly damaged. A
small hole in his armor shows where a sword pierced him. {x

55276.name: {GOn a Small Path{x
description: {g
In the distance the sound of spattering water can be heard.
The small forest track leads north. Here, the forest becomes
somewhat denser. Through the trees west you can see a brook.{x

55173.name: {GI{gntersection with another {GP{gath to the {GN{gorth{x
description: {g
There are three ways to go from here. To the east, west
and north. North leads to another temple not far from
here, while the western and eastern path both go around
the temple south.{x

55131.name: {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road begins to get a little muddy here as you approach a
babbling brook which runs from the north by a shop labeled
Euolen lu' a'leai Khaliizin, to the south past a shop labeled
Zirn lu' Ssrig'luin.{x

55284.name: {YB{yank{x
description: {w
Behind a small desk sits a human, counting a few platinum
coins. This is the bank of this little village. The
shopkeepers and the tourists withdraw and deposit their
money here. The local people do not have so much money. {x

55120.name: {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road winds down even further through the dense forest,
the sounds of the market place are almost indistinguishable
by now. The sun is almost blocked out by the sun glaring down
though the leaves in the canopy. Quite large dragonflies fly
overhead from a near by pond.{x

55207.name: {wCorner in the Hallway{x
description: East of here burns a small torch on the
corner of  the hallway.  Its dark smoke
makes strange  shadows on the walls.  A
cold  breeze blows  east and  gives the
hall a  strange and  creepily ambiance.{x

55139.name: {CN{catha {CE{cldalie {CE{cl'lar{g ({GA{gn {GE{glven {GH{gouse){x
description: You enter a small elven residence, there are a few rooms
off to the side, its decorated nicely with {ywood{* siding. The
beams running across the ceiling are carved and painted in
{Ws{wi{*lv{we{Wr {*and {Gg{green {Gv{gines{* and {Gl{geaves{*. On the wall there are
several pictures, framed in very much the same manner the
trim of the house is done. One of the catching pictures is
of a small elven girl, about the age of 16. She has very
long {Ybl{yon{Yde{* hair, {Ct{curquoise{* eyes, and pale skin. The smile
on her face almost makes you want to melt, an aura can
almost be felt from the picture. Her {Wwhite{* gown and look of
peace {Rw{rar{ym{Ys{* your heart.{x

55237.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: The hallway stops suddenly. A large hole in the ground must lead to a
lower level. Disorderly symbols fill up the southern wall. North leads
back to the temple.{x

55244.name: {*I{wm{Wported {*W{we{Wddings and {*C{wu{Wstoms{x
description: {w
Wonderful! This shop has all kinds of wedding dresses and
suits, from everywhere. A few elven tunics, a lot of elvish
suits and also a few human, drow and dwarf dresses. A large
beautiful marble counter stands against the eastern wall.{x

55189.name: {*Cobblestone Path Leading to a Sanctum{x
description: {g
As you reach the stairs for the inner sanctum spirits follow
you, dancing about the path you choose. You can tell now
that the glow from the temple comes from the walls of the
temple itself.{x

55161.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gYou can get a little bit better of a view of whats left, it {x
{glooks as if the inner sanctum is still intact in a clearing. {x
{gThere also seems to be a number of spirits around the sanctum.{x

55245.name: {CT{ch{Be {bS{*w{Wi{*m {bS{Bh{co{Cp{x
description: You enter the colorful shop finding all sorts of suits that
are used for swiming. The special fabric that they are made
of looks very strechy and looks like it won't realy soak up
water. The perfect type of material for wearing into the
water without weighing you down.{x

55212.name: {wFuther in the Hallway{x
description: The hallway  continue north.  The walls
are beautifully  decorated with mithril
symbols and cobweb. North seems nothing
but darkness. On the floor lies a small
pool of  dried up red blood.  It smells
moudly in  this deep and  dark hallway.{x

55166.name: {GI{gntersection near the {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gYou reach an intersection with a path leading towards the {x
{ginner sanctum. You can see a few spirits dancing about the {x
{gground, and light coming from the sanctum east. The path {x
{gcontinues to the north, where a second temple can be seen.{x

55225.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: On each side of the hallway, both west and east, is a large wooden
door. The main hall continues north and south. Far to the south a
small flickering flame is visible.{x

55292.name: {wDa{*rk {wMu{*st{wy H{*al{wlw{*ay{x
description: The hallway widens and the darkness increases. The floor
here is covered with bones and dried up blood. Some of the
bones are almost rotted away. It must have been years ago
this bloodshedding happened. West is an intersection, east
the hallway seems to end.{x

55251.name: {wI{Wn {wt{Wh{we {WT{we{Wm{wp{Wl{we{x
description: {W
{gFrom he{Gre you {gcan see{* a shri{wne n{Worth{w, co{*nstruct{ged here{G for th{ge Deity
{gof Wild{G Nature{g, Silva{*nus. So{wuth {Wis a{wn al{*tar, sp{gecially{G there {gto pray
{gto Lord{G Oghma,{g Protec{*tor of {wBard{Ws an{wd Go{*d of Kn{gowledge{G. West {ga small
{groom is{G visibl{ge, with{* a few {wblue{W sof{wa's {*and a w{gooden t{Gable. T{ghere is
{ga room {Gwhere p{geople c{*an sit {wand {Wrela{wx a {*bit, wa{giting f{Gor the {gpriest.{x

55179.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
You can get a better view of the second temple by now. The
outer columns stretch a good 50 feet in the air, creating a
ring around the sanctum. The sanctum itself is glowing and
a small light can be seen between the two entrances. The
temple is obviously build later and on a much larger scale.{x

55157.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
You arrive at some destroyed steps, by now all the makou
lamps are destroyed and there is not a spirit in sight.
The area looks completely dead and ruined, trees toppled,
bones from animals lie scattered about as well.{x

55240.name: {GS{gtrip {GS{ghop {GG{gardens{x
description: The blue carpet on the ground suddenly stops here and a
wonderful fountain has been placed in the center of the
hall. To the north you see the carpet continue again.
West is a shop that sells imported foods and wines, east
is a shop that sells all kind of swimming suits. South
leads back to the entrance of this building. {x

55231.name: {wA {wD{*ark {wC{*rypt{x
description: In this dark chamber stands a large sarcophagus, beautifully decorated.
The rest of the room is filled with decayed books, urns, robes and
other things as remembrance to those that are buried here.{x
{*A very large {wS{*arcophagus stands here, that seems to provide enough room for six persons.{x

55174.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
The debris here has been pounded into the ground, as if lots
of big heavy things have come through the area quite a few
times causing the debris to sink as they ran across it.{x

55227.name: {wA D{*ar{wk R{*oo{wm{x
description: In this dark room is absolutely nothing. Only a few burned up candles
are attached to the walls here. A large hatch seems to lead to room
below this one. The lock has been broken.{x

55183.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
Things grow increasingly silent as you continue to move to
the north. The debris is still quite heavy. You notice some
smaller debris is stuck in the tops of damaged trees.{x

55289.name: {wIn{*te{wrs{*ec{wti{*on{x
description: North and south are large and heavily fortified doors. The
southern door is almost falling off, burst open by an
incredible power. Many skeletons lie here, and bones lie
scattered all over the place.{x

55247.name: {MG{mirl's {wImported Clothing{x
description: Around the shop you see many different maniquins, each with
a different style of cloths and manure of dress. Dresses
line the racks from many diffrent continents. Each section
is devided up as to the realm from which each style came
from.{x

55219.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: This smaller hall continues west and east. To the east is an
intersection with a larger hallway, west leads to aprivate
chamber. A strange shine lightens the place.{x

55176.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
You begin to notice deep claw marks all over the destroyed
columns, as well as in trees. It looks as if some of the
limbs were bitten off as well. From here it becomes more and
more clear that the temple north is heavily damaged as well.{x

55208.name: {wIntersection{x
description: The two  hallways meet each  other here
in this  larger room.  Decorations that
must have been  overwhelming when  they
were created, are now covered with dust
and corroded by the high humidity here.
The quality of  the materials must have
been  not as  good as  that of  mitril.
Still it  is obvious  that the builders
or  the principals of  this temple must
have  been  extemely  wealthy  persons.{x

55271.name: {GA Path in the Forest{x
description: {g
The birds in the forest can no longer compete with the noise
the children, who are playing in the small village north,
make. West is an intersection with the path that leads towards
the village. The makou lamps are visible through the trees.{x

55145.name: {wM'r{Wann{wdii l{Wu{w' 'ra{Wn{wndi {g({GH{gusband and {GW{gife){x
description: As you enter this shop you notice mannequins dressed nicely
in beautiful elven gowns and elven ceremonial armor. It would
appear as if this is a shop for wedding attire, elven style.{x

55218.name: {wIn{*te{wrs{*ec{wti{*on {win {*th{we Du{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: The main hallway leads north and south here, but west and east
are two other halls. although there burns no torch or other
light here, a strange shine illuminates the intersection.{x

55273.name: {GDeep in the Forest{x
description: {g
As the sound of the brook becomes fainter, the sound of the
forest and the noise of playing children become louder. The
chirping of birds give this spot a pleasant sensation.{x

55239.name: {GS{gtrip {GS{ghop {GG{gardens{x
description: Inside this large building are many different shops. West is
a shop for imported girl clothes, east is one for imported
boy clothes. The hallway continues north to more shops and a
long blue carpet has been unrolled in that direction. South
is the exit, here the floor is made of beautiful marble and
is kept very clean. {x

55254.name: {wT{Wh{we {wW{Wa{wi{Wt{wi{Wn{wg {wR{Wo{wo{Wm{x
description: {W
{gIn this{G small {groom ar{*e some {wblue{W sof{wa's {*and a w{gooden t{Gable wi{gth some
{gbooks o{Gn it. A{g servan{*t stand{ws ne{Wxt t{wo th{*e door {gsouth t{Ghat loo{gks very
{gstrong,{G not ea{gsy to p{*ick or {wdest{Wroy.{w The{* walls {gare emp{Gty, thi{gs whole
{gplace l{Gooks ve{gry sobe{*r, but {wstil{Wl co{wmfor{*table e{gnough. {GThe hal{glway to
{gthe eas{Gt leads{g back t{*o the a{wltar{W, th{we sh{*rine an{gd to th{Ge marbl{ge gate.{x

55114.name: {CThe Center of the S{chuk {CK{c'lar {g({GM{garket {GP{glace){x
description: The center of the square by far is the busiest part of the
village. Vector guards patrol the square looking for
thieves and other ravel that may disrupt the peace of the
village. People from all walks of life and all races have
gathered in the square to sell and shop for goods. Jesters
play their games and entertain the folk shopping. Children
run play fighting with sticks through the square. {x

55143.name: {RT{railor {RS{rhop{W - {YC{ylosed{x
description: {m
A large counter lies before you as the shop appears fairly
small, except for the large room behind the counter where
there is enough room for a twenty people to make clothes. It
looks as if they used to be able to make you just about
anything here. However, the shop seems deserted totally now.{x

55165.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gThe cobblestone path stops here, or is so heavily damaged {x
{gthat it is hard to distinguish it from the other debris. A {x
{gterrible force must have been busy, demolishing everything.{x

55221.name: {wA S{*tr{wan{*ge {wMa{*nh{wol{*e{x
description: This small space seems to be excavated by hand. The strange
shine that lightened the rooms above does not seem to come
here. A few breadcrumbs lie here.{x

55263.name: {wA{gn {gE{Gn{wo{Wr{wm{go{Gu{gs {gO{Wl{Gd {gO{Wa{Gk{x
description: {gA few rabbits walk around the enormous oak that stands here.  West
a white hammock can be seen between the trees and east is a small
pool.  North leads back to the grassy field.  A small cabin with some
books stands here.  {x

55127.name: {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
As you head east you can see through the trees makou lamps
light bright and burning along a cobblestone road. Set back
amongst the trees are more shops to the north and south. To
the north a sign outside a building labeled M'ranndii lu'
'ranndi with the picture of what looks like a wedding cake
on it. To the south is a bakery.{x

55185.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
You can get a little bit better of a view of whats left, it
looks as if the inner sanctum is still intact in a clearing.
There also seems to be a number of spirits around the sanctum.{x

55202.name: {wInside the Temple{x
description: The hallway leads west,  illuminated by
large  candles.  The whole temple seems
to be made  of marble and the walls are
decorated with mithril  symbols. Debris
from the  ceiling  lies on  the  floor.
South  leads  back  outside,  where the
marble path leads to the  other temple.{x

55141.name: {GI{gmport {GS{ghop{x
description: You enter the large building and notice many different rooms
to this store. Everything in the store looks as if its from
a distant land. Clothing never seen before, types of food
that most could never have imagined, hats made from different
things that could be considered almost vulgar. Everything
looks very odd, but at the very least interesting.{x

55258.name: {wA {gG{Gr{wa{Ws{Gs{gy F{Gi{We{Gl{gd{x
description: {gThe path continues west between the trees.  A small cottage can be
seen southwest.  A few flowers decorate the ground here.  Far east
burns a small campfire.  {x

55252.name: {gS{Gh{wr{Wi{Gn{ge of {gS{Gi{*l{yva{*n{Gu{gs{x
description: {W
{gThis sh{Grine ha{gs been {*erected{w her{We fo{wr Si{*lvanus,{g God of{G the mo{gre Wild
{gNature.{G He is {gon good{* terms {wwith{W Cha{wunte{*a, who {gis the {GGoddess{g of the
{gmore or{Gdered n{gature. {*Silvanu{ws ta{Wkes {wprid{*e in hi{gs true {Gneutral{gity and
{ghe can {Goften b{ge found{* on the{w pla{Wne o{wf Co{*ncordan{gt Oppos{Gition. {gBesides
{gthe shr{Gine, th{ge room {*is empt{wy. T{Whe w{walls{* are fl{gat and {Gnot dec{gorated.{x

55282.name: {CA {CB{ca{wb{Wbl{wi{cn{Cg{C Brook{x
description: {B
The brook flows from south to east. A tree lies here in the
water, causing a few small rapids. The shallow water is full
of stones and dead branches, but still very clear. South is
a small path visible.{x

55222.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: This is the eastern hallway which leads to a private chamber of
one of the priests or clergymen. A musty smell permeates the air.
The chamber east is accessible through a large wooden door.{x

55255.name: {wA {gG{Gr{wa{Ws{Gs{gy {gF{Gi{We{Gl{gd{x
description: {gA small campfire burns here magically, it leaves no traces on the
ground.  This is where Azarot spends his spare time.  Southwest stands
a huge oak, north is a small cave, lit up by a few candlelights.  Far
west is a beautiful garden.{W

55199.name: {GN{gear the {GS{gecond {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
From here you can see that this temple is not exactly the
same as the temple south. Not only is this one more
intact, it also builded completely different. There are
two entrances at this side, leading to a center that can
not be seen from here. {x

55238.name: {wNo{*th{win{*g{x
description: {8Darkness.  The hard stone of the catacombs gives way to what feels
like dirt.  Faint breathing can be heard, and the ground seems to
rumble constantly beneath your feet.

55190.name: {WO{*rthae {WD{*elmah {Wd{*'lil {WE{*ldalie {WQ{*uar'valsharess{x
description: Scribed above the entry are the words 'Orthae Delmah d'lil
Eldalie Quar'valsharess'. The walls of smoothed marble echo
whispers of the name 'Hanali' in your ears.{x

55261.name: {WA {gB{Ge{ga{wu{Wt{wi{gf{Gu{gl {gS{Gp{wr{Wi{Gn{gg{x
description: {gA few towels hang in the branches of a smaller tree.  A nice
bubbling pool looks very tempting.  The water is steaming a bit, it
must be kept warm with magic.  A small fountain with colder water
stands next to the pool.  {x

55194.name: {*Cobblestone Path Leading to a Sanctum{x
description: {g
You walk down towards the inner sanctum, which lights your
path. Spirits abound the trail once again causing more light
for you to walk by.  {x

55246.name: {yI{wm{Wported {yF{wo{Wods and {yW{wi{Wnes{x
description: {y
The smell of fresh bread, flesh and other food is delicous.
A small counter stands in the corner. Three racks full with
all kind of wines stand against the southern wall, the food
stands in a large glass display case.{x

55223.name: {wA P{*ri{wva{*te {wCh{*am{wbe{*r{x
description: In this dark and cold room stands a bed, a lounge chair and a
simple vault. None of them seems used recently, covered with dust
and cobweb.{x

55283.name: {YB{yook {YS{ytore{x
description: {w
In this small book store various books are being sold. Not
only historical books about this area, but also personal
stories. The seller stands behind his desk, reading a book
with a green cover. A small sign is placed here.{x
{W
{y | {YG{yreetings...                                        |
{y | {yIf you want to sell your own book here, please sent |
{y | {ya note to {GA{gzarot{y with information of what the book  |
{y | {ywill be about. He will send you a note back, or     |
{y | {ygive you a tell with more specific information.     |
{W

55116.name: {CNorthern end of the {CS{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: This is the northern end of the market place. The well-
traveled road continues north, as well as the cobblestone.
This path is lit up with makou lamps, one about every 10
feet and looks as if it is trying to lead you somewhere. {x

55290.name: {wVa{*ul{wt{x
description: In this room sit a few tables, probably here all the loot
was gathered. A few racks stand in the corner. This seems
to be the only clean place, besides from a few cobwebs.{x

55119.name: {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis {g({GW{gestern {GR{goad){x
description: {g
The well traveled road warn down from years of usage leads
on to the east, warn deep with the grass and trees overhead,
a feeling of peace settles over you. The quiet calm of the
birds makes this town almost seem perfect.{x

55298.name: {yB{Ya{yc{wk{Ws{wt{ya{Yg{ye{x
description: {*In this small room next to the stage the actors can study {x
{*on the piece they are playing or going to play. A few {x
{*chairs and a small table stand in the center of the room. {x
{*A control panel with many buttons sits here in the corner. {x
{R>> Scan down to see how many visitors there are <<{x
{MPossible options: (say them){x
{m give me the status tech{x
{m do the lights on tech{x
{m do the lights off tech{x
{m open the curtains tech{x
{m close the curtains tech{x

55220.name: {wA P{*ri{wva{*te {wCh{*am{wbe{*r{x
description: This is a quite small chamber with a simple bed and sink.
Cobweb and dust covers the whole room. A corpse sits in the
corner and a few bones lie scattered.{x

55188.name: {*Cobblestone Path Leading to a Sanctum{x
description: {g
You walk down towards the inner sanctum, which lights your
path. Spirits abound the trail once again causing more light
for you to walk by.{x

55253.name: {gA{Gl{wt{Ga{gr of {gO{*g{Wh{*m{ga{x
description: {W
{gHere is{G the al{gtar whe{*re you {wcan {Wpray{w to {*Oghma, {gthe God{G of Kno{gwledge.
{gThe whi{Gte marb{gle alta{*r has b{ween {Wplac{wed i{*n the c{genter o{Gf the r{goom. An
{gowl, ma{Gde of o{gnyx, st{*ands ne{wxt t{Wo it{w. Th{*e owl i{gs the s{Gymbol o{gf Oghma
{gand a r{Geal owl{g can al{*ways be{w fou{Wnd o{wn hi{*s shoul{gder. Th{Ge weste{grn wall
{gis fill{Ged with{g a beau{*tiful d{wrawi{Wng o{wf Og{*hma as {ga dark {Gskinned{g man in
{gfine wh{Gite clo{gthes, w{*ith a g{wuita{Wr. H{we is{* served{g by Den{Geir and{g Milil.{x

55270.name: {WA {wC{Wo{wbb{Wl{we{Ws{wto{Wn{we P{Wa{wt{Wh{x
description: {wThis small cobblestone path leads south, towards an arch that is
the entrance of the forest where Azarot lives.  From here it is not
possible to see any kind of building.  North leads back to the small
temple.  {x

55288.name: {wSe{*cr{wet {*Hi{wde{*ou{wt{x
description: Slowly the hallway slants down as you come closer to some
kind of intersection. The smell increases and so does the
amount of bones and blood. This bloodshet must have been
many years ago.{x

55129.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
As you follow the makou lamps towards the north, you notice
more and more spirits gathering near the edge of the trail.
The further north you go the denser the woods get. To the
northwest and northeast you can see buildings through the
trees.{x

55111.name: {CSouth Eastern end of the S{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: As you head to the far corners of the market square it
begins to quiet down, it seems as if most of the trade is
done in the middle of the city. The backs of the buildings
behind you echo the noise from the surrounding bazaar. A
beautiful large theater has been build east of here.{x

55274.name: {GAn Old Marble Bridge{x
description: {g
An old bridge, made of marble, provides a safe passage to the
other side. The brook flows in northern direction, but it is
impossible to follow it there, the stream is obstructed by
fallen trees and rocks and the forest is too dense to enter
it. It seems possible to follow the stream south, the path
continues west.{x

55209.name: {wClose to an Intersection{x
description: West  of here  a small torch  flickers,
illuminating the hallway. This place is
obviously no longer used by the priests
that  once  prayed and  gathered  here. {x

55122.name: {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road finally comes into civilization, buildings are set
in amongst the dense trees. Its very quiet and peaceful for
a shopping row. To the west lies a building with a sign,
labeled Ssin'urn Delmah. There is a picture of a house on
the sign.{x

55107.name: {YO{ynhir {YD{y'lil {YS{ysussun {g({GW{gorship of the {GL{gight){x
description: {w
As you enter the village the smell of bread permeates the
air. There is a small bustle from the town, but hardly
busy. The town is very laid back and everyone seems very
friendly. Carved into the poles where guards stand are
elvish designed oak leaves entwined in vines, finely
etched. A small temple lies northwest.{x

55151.name: {cThe {CL{cibrary{x
description: Though not immense in size it still holds quite a number of
historical documents. From the index of books and documents,
it would almost seem as if the village cares nothing about
what is happening outside of their village.{x

55205.name: {wSharp Turn East{x
description: Here  the  hallway makes  a sharp  turn
east,  further  and  further  into  the
temple. Some sculptures stand here as a
decoration. Mithril symbols can be seen
everywhere in here. South leads back to
the lighter and  happier outside world.{x

55110.name: {CSouthern end of the {CS{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: You have reached the southern end of the market place,
small venders have set up their shops to make the days
wages hoping to bring home food for their families.
Surprisingly the Humans and Dwarves selling their goods
in such a small village seem to be getting along with
the surrounding populous.{x

55168.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gAs you stroll northward you get an uneasy feeling as if it {x
{gis not quite safe to go this far north. The ambiance is {x
{gquite tense and danger seems to be watching you right now.{x

55133.name: {*The {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{* turns East{x
description: {g
The road turns to the east, as south continues to the backdoor
of the Library. There are reading tables and benches outside
the Library for people to sit and enjoy a good book any time
they need too.{x

55210.name: {wDeeper in the Temple{x
description: The hallway continues south and east. A
small stream  flows away  to the south.
The light that lightens the hallway can
been seen  to the southwest.  The walls
are  decorated with  beautiful symbols.{x

55164.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gNow moving away from the sanctum the air grows warmer. The {x
{gpath is cobblestone here and still only rarely visible from {x
{gunder the debris and vegetation. The sound of singing birds{x
{gcan be heard from far away, they seem to avoid this place.{x

55200.name: {gIn {GF{gront of the {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
North is the wall of the temple, it is impossible to go
there. The marble path splits here, leading west and east,
to the two entrances of this temple. {x

55158.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
There are pieces of shattered marble all about the area,
trees are broken and embedded with marble. The grass also
appears dead and the sound of any birds has ceased.{x

55135.name: {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
As you round the corner heading south, the ground gets soggy
again as a stream cuts back across the path in front of you.
Cart tracks can be seen deep in the mud from carts going by.
To the west there is a building labeled Library.{x

55154.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
The town's lights grow faint behind the trees as you
continue on your course north. A few spirits roam about.
The forest path is illuminated by makou lamps, not all in
a very good shape.{x

55125.name: {*Turning West on the {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road turns from its northern course through the trees to
the west. There is a large building to the north labeled
'{YI{ymports{g', showing a picture of a cart and a ship. It is a
rather large building, decorated in the style of multiple
cultures and races.{x

55260.name: {WA {yF{Yr{yi{we{Wn{wd{Yl{yy {yC{Yo{wt{Wt{wa{Yg{ye{x
description: {wThis cute cottage looks very clean, maybe a bit sober.  A small bed
sits in the corner and comfortable chair stands near the window.  A
soft blue carpet lies on the ground.  The door is north.  {x

55155.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
The town's lights by now are out of view, but the makou
lamps continue to light the way. A few are bent over in
half and broken. The amount of spirits is also dwindling.
Far north a large ruined temple is visible. The path
continues towards it. {x

55197.name: {GP{gath to the {GS{gecond {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
Not much debris lies here and to the north it seems to
become less and less. A small marble path, covered by
moss and other vegetation leads there. In the distance
north lies another temple, that looks almost the same
as the one to the south, but less ruined. {x

55198.name: {gA {GM{goss covered {GM{garble {GP{gath{x
description: {g
The marble path continues north and here lies almost no
debris. From here you can see again that the temple north
is also severly damaged, but still intact. {x

55233.name: {wS{*arcophagus{x
description: Inside the tomb lie a few corpses dressed in long white robes. There
seem to be no treasures at all, they must have been taken by the
first adventurers that searched these crypts.{x

55126.name: {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road heads east towards the heart of the village. Nestled
in the trees are more shops, one to the north and one to the
south. North lies a large clothing barter, and to the south,
an elvish weapon shop.{x

55191.name: {WI{*nner {WS{*anctum{x
description: {w
The sanctum opens up into a oval room where the grass grows
green, and a soft blue glow lights the room. The water from
two ponds, one to the north, and one to the south, shimmers
against the walls.{x

55162.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gAs you reach the closest apex of the path, you can almost {x
{ghear whispering from inter sanctum. You can also catch a {x
{gglimpse of what looks to be a second temple to the north.{x

55124.name: {*Another Bend in the {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road takes another turn to the north. A large tree grows
out of the corner making strait travel on the road almost
impossible. To the south there is another door leading into
the Ssin'urn Delmah.{x

55108.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {WS{ws{*uss{wu{Wn {g({GW{galk to {GL{gight){x
description: {w
Ruts warn in from carts towing food and supplies into the
town north, steer your path down the dirty street. The
open gate of a small marble temple to the west is guarded
by two paladins, dressed in white armor and clothes.{x

55201.name: {gIn {GF{gront of the {GW{gestern {GE{gntrance{x
description: {g
The marble path makes a sharp turn north here and leads
inwards the temple. The walls are not in very good shape,
but the decorations are stillvisible. A few candles light
the hallway north. East leads back to the moss covered
marble path.{x

55279.name: {wA {*H{widden {*S{wpace{x
description: In this small space below the broken temple stands a bed and
a sink, both covered with cobweb. The dusty floor is made of
large tiles. A half burned candle stands on the tabel that
sits in the eastern corner. The small ladder which can be
used to go come here, or to go back, is a bit ramshackle. A
door is visible north, it seems to be burst open by a strong
force and then quickly repaired again in a hurry. A sign has
been placed on the door: "{wDo not go beyond, dangerous beast{*".{x

55109.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {WS{ws{*uss{wu{Wn{r{x
description: {w
The main road as depicted by signs saying L' Z'hin Ulu
Ssussun looks well traveled. You can hear a few people
chatting, carts rolling, and horses trotting up to the
north. {x

55186.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
As you weave in and out of the fallen debris, you noticed
this temple spans quite a ways around this forest. It would
almost appear as if this here was only the outer wall of
the temple.{x

55241.name: {GS{gtrip {GS{ghop {GG{gardens{x
description: The hallway continues north and so does the blue carpet.
West is a shop that sells all kind of gifts and gags from
all over the realms, east is a shop that mainly sells
wedding suits, tunics and dresses. North all kind of beds,
crips and cradles are being sold, for the younger among us.{x

55138.name: {YL{yuent {YR{yevis {g({GE{gastern {GR{goad){x
description: {g
Just outside the market place the cobblestone ends, turning
into a plain dirt road. Groves warn from carriages mark the
way to another part of the village to the west.{x

55216.name: {wAt the {*A{yl{Yt{ya{*r{x
description: This  looks  like  the  place where the
worship  and  the religious  ceremonies
were led,  back in the days this temple
was still used.  A marble  altar stands
in  the center, close  to the  southern
wall.  Behind the  altar  a very  small
stairway leads down,  below the temple.
Nothing but darkness can be seen there,
it was probably used by the priest that
was leading  the  ceremony. North leads
back to the hallways of the temple. The
walls  here are decorated  with  mitril
symbols,  that kept  their  beauty over
{*the past few  years, in contrast to the {x
{*decorations north, that slowly  perish.{x

55264.name: {yA {YS{yi{wm{Wp{wl{ye {YK{yi{wt{Wc{wh{ye{Yn{x
description: {yThis is a dead end, the cave only leads back east, to the wooden
table.  A large lantern is placed in the corner here.  A large open
chest with kettles, pots, pans, plates and knifes stands here.  A
small fireplace eems rarely used, probably this is where Azarot
prepares his food when it rains outside.  {x

55187.name: {GR{guined {GF{gorest{x
description: {g
Pillars of the probably once great temple lie about the
ground completely destroyed and unreadable. The travelable
area is towards the west.{x

55256.name: {wA {gG{Gr{wa{Ws{Gs{gy F{Gi{We{Gl{gd{x
description: {gA small muddy path is worn out in the grass here.  East burns a
campfire and south stands an enormous oak.  The forest is too dense to
the north, it is not possible to go there.  West leads to a small lake
and another cave.  Through the trees a small cottage is visible
southwest.  {x

55182.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
Now moving away from the sanctum the air grows warmer. The
path is cobblestone here and still only rarely visible from
under the debris and vegetation. The sound of singing birds
can be heard from far away, they seem to avoid this place.{x

55146.name: {YS{ytables{x
description: {y
You enter into the stables and are overwhelmed by the smell
of hay and feed. It is very neatly kept, however it does
still smell from all the animals. {x

55150.name: {yThe Inn at Onhir D'lil Ssussun{x
description: You enter the calm inn and notice it is quite large for a
village of this size. The wood beams run tall, and the fire
in the corner roars high heating the entirety of the Inn.
There is a tavern set off to the side and a restrant off
that. Upstairs would the rooms for visitors be.{x

55229.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: Slowly slanting the hallway keeps going south in a straigth line. A
few drawings on the wall show the beautiful Goddess Hanali, to whom
this temple is dedicated.{x

55167.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gYou can get a better view of the second temple by now. The {x
{gouter columns stretch a good 50 feet in the air, creating a {x
{gring around the sanctum. The sanctum itself is glowing and{x
{ga small light can be seen between the two entrances. The{x
{gtemple is obviously build later and on a much larger scale.{x

55272.name: {GAlong the path{x
description: {g
The smell of baking food becomes prominent and the forest is
less dense here. Through the trees faint lights of makou lamps
are visible. The path makes a turn to the south. {x

55285.name: {wSe{*cr{wet {*Hi{wde{*ou{wt{x
description: This narrow hallway slowly slopes down towards the east.
West is the secret door that connects his dungeon with
the rest of the catacombs below the temple. Some dried
up blood lies here.{x

55249.name: {YA{ybove the {YI{ynn{x
description: This large room is filled with simple clean beds. A small
bathroom for everyone is in one corner, the stairs down in
another. A few drawings of landscapes hang against the walls.

55170.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gYou begin to notice deep claw marks all over the destroyed {x
{gcolumns, as well as in trees. It looks as if some of the {x
{glimbs were bitten off as well. From here it becomes more and {x
{gmore clear that the temple north is heavily damaged as well.{x

55250.name: {gU{Gn{gd{*e{wr {Wth{we {*G{ga{Gt{ge{x
description: {W
{gAn enor{Gmous ma{grble ga{*te has {wbeen{W con{wstru{*cted he{gre. Beh{Gind it,{g to the
{gwest is{G a smal{gl templ{*e erect{wed b{Wy a {wHigh{* Priest{g of Tru{G. Two P{galadins
{gare gua{Grding t{ghe gate{*, which{w can{W be {wclos{*ed and {glocked {Gif need{ged with
{ga huge {Gbronze {gfence. {*The lef{wt pi{Wllar{w of {*the mar{gble gat{Ge is de{gcorated
{gwith a {Gsculptu{gre of O{*ghma an{wd th{We ri{wght {*pillar {gwith on{Ge of Si{glvanus.{x
{yAn enormous bronze fence is pulled up here.  The two paladins can,
in case of danger, lower the fence to seal off the gate.  {x

55118.name: {CNorth Western end of the {CS{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: Just like every other part of the market venders here sell
goods to earn their meal. You can strongly smell the scent
of sweet bread cooking wafting down from the north. A book
store is located west of here.{x

55206.name: {wTurn Back South{x
description: To  the  southeast  a small  floodlight
flickers, illuminating the hallway. The
floor and walls are covered with cobweb
and dust,  but look solid.  The symbols
and the other  decorations on the walls
are quite heavily damaged.  The hallway
continues south,  west brings you back.{x

55268.name: {wA {gB{Ge{ga{wu{Wt{wi{gf{Gu{gl {gG{Ga{wr{Wd{Ge{gn{x
description: {gThe field here is full of flowers, all kind of colors.  Butterflies
and bees, all kind of wonderful insects and animals live here or in
the trees that surround this field.  A few trees in a small orchard
yield apples.  North is a clear blue lake, that continues to the east.
The water seems to have a perfect temperature for swimming.  A few
towels are placed on the ground here.  {x

55242.name: {BC{brib {Wand {MC{mradle{x
description: {w
In this cute little shop stand all kind of small cradles and
also toys, blankets and napkins in lovely colors. A colorful
counter stands against the northern wall. There is a lot of
choice, mostly for babies. {x

55132.name: {*The {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{* turns South{x
description: {g
The road curves to the south through the dense trees. To the
north there is a tavern. Outside the tavern is well kept,
with a small stable to tie up your mounts and an overnight
stable where your pet will be taken very good care of. {x

55134.name: {*The {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{* turns South{x
description: {g
The path winds around and begins to head south past another
residence. Set back you can see elven children playing in
the yard. One is pretending to be a magitek soldier, all
dressed up to look magitekish, and the other is hiding.{x

55196.name: {WThe {CS{couthern {CP{co{Bo{bl {Wof {RH{realth{x
description: {g
Near the southern wall of the room there is a pedestal with a
tome lying open on the top of the pedestal. A warm glowing
pool glimmers in the center of the grassy room emanating a
soft blue glow from within the pool.{x

55172.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gThe debris here has been pounded into the ground, as if lots {x
{gof big heavy things have come through the area quite a few {x
{gtimes causing the debris to sink as they ran across it.{x

55291.name: {wCa{*ge{x
description: In this large and dark room stands an empty trough and lie
some bare-gnawn bones. The walls show deep scratches made
by very strong claws. Apparently the inhabitant of the
prison cell decided to leave through the front door.{x

55152.name: {CN{catha {CI{cnlul {CE{cl'lar {g({GA S{gmall {GR{gesidence{g){x
description: You enter a small elven home. It is quiet and quaint and
very clean. There are vases on the table and the dressers
around the main room look well kept up.{x

55160.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gAs you weave in and out of the fallen debris, you noticed {x
{gthis temple spans quite a ways around this forest. It would {x
{galmost appear as if this here was only the outer wall of {x
{gthe temple.{x

55265.name: {WA {cS{Cm{Wa{Cl{cl {cL{Ca{Wk{ce{x
description: {cThe water is quite shallow.  A soft breeze makes the temperature
above the water very comfortable.  The clear and fresh water is very
calm.  {x

55299.name: {yA{Yt {wt{Whe St{wa{Yg{ye{x
description: This is the stage, the audience is west of here, they can
see what happens here. Make sure the curtains are open and
the lights are on. (People will be able to see what happens
here anyway, but it looks nice if they get a message that
the curtain opens, and the lights go on.){x
{W
{R>> Everything said and done here, will be seen in the auditorium <<
>> No quitting here... <<{x
{R>> To communicate with the crew/other players, use tell and gtell <<{x

55121.name: {*A Turn in the {YL{yinoin {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road takes a turn to the north as it passes a pond. The
pond is overgrown with lilies and over run by dragonflies.
On occasion you can catch a glimpse of a water sprite, glowing
blue dancing across the lilies.{x

55184.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
As you reach the closest apex of the path, you can almost
hear whispering from inter sanctum. You can also catch a
glimpse of what looks to be a second temple to the north.{x

55236.name: {CElven Armor Shop{x
description: {*When you enter the shop, you are almost blinded by the shine {x
{*of the glimmering armor hung on the walls. All pieces are {x
{*inscribed with leaves, vines, and birds, ect. All pieces {x
{*are well made and look to be mithril.{x

55112.name: {CSouth Western end of the {CS{chuk {CK{c'lar{x
description: Ah, a much needed break from the hustle and bustle of the
main square. There is a shade tree and a bench under the
branches of the tree. There is also a well here to refresh
visitors to the quaint town. {x

55175.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
The ground here is heavily trampled down. It would almost
seem as if a group of horses galloped through here. The
imprints however show large three-toed feet. Trees are
broken in half, as well as some of the stone debris.{x

55280.name: {CA Forest {CS{ct{Wre{ca{Cm{x
description: {B
The small stream continues to the north, between the large
trees. Sometimes it is possible to step from stone to stone
and make sure that your feet don't get wet. A few fishes
swim in the shallow water.{x

55214.name: {wEastern Entrace{x
description: The torches on the wall  illuminate the
hallway  that makes a sharp turn to the
east. The walls here are decorated with
mithril  symbols.  The  tiled  floor is
covered  with  a thin  layer  of  dust.{x

55193.name: {*Cobblestone Path Leading to a Sanctum{x
description: {g
As you reach the stairs for the inner sanctum spirits follow
you, dancing about the path you choose. You can tell now
that the glow from the temple comes from the walls of the
temple itself.{x

55277.name: {GEdge of the Forest{x
description: {g
The scent of the forest and its sounds make this a very
relaxing place for many. A small dirt path leads west, away
from the thunder mountains and the plane, heading for a
little town that must be somewhere in that direction. {x

55226.name: {wLi{*br{war{*y{x
description: This small chamber is full of chests, bookcases and other cabinets.
The wood is slowly rotting away. A corpse lies scattered all about
the room.{x

55243.name: {MI{wm{Wported {MG{wi{Wfts and {MG{wa{Wgs{x
description: {m
This shop is full with all kind of strange, funny and rare
stuff. Racks, cabins, boxes, all filled with gags from all
over the realm. There is not much space left, but there is
also a small counter, somewhere in the center of the room.{x

55248.name: {BG{buy's {wImported Clothing{x
description: This is obviously a shop for men. The strong pants are lined
in racks near the entrance. Next to it are the t-shirts. On
the other side are the long wizard robes and also different
garments and vestments.{x

55144.name: {YT{yhe {YB{yakery{x
description: You can smell the great smells of elvish bread and pastries
wafting from the oven in the back of the shop. Laid out nicely
on the counters and in glass display cases done up in elvish
garnish lie pastries, almost making your mouth water.{x

55128.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
A dirt road intersects the walk of light from the west and
continues to the east. The walk of light leads on to the
north heading deeper in to the dense woods. To the south
you can hear the bustle of the market place. A few spirits
of light dance along the trail north.{x

55102.name: {GA {CB{ca{wb{Wbl{wi{cn{Cg {GDense Forest {CS{ct{Wre{ca{Cm{x
description: {g
A brook babbles along bounding over rocks, the lush grass
growing over the side, overgrown plants hovering over the
shaded stream. Fish can be seen swimming about. The brook
continues in northern and southern direction.{x

55192.name: {WO{*rthae {WD{*elmah {Wd{*'lil {WE{*ldalie {WQ{*uar'valsharess{x
description: Scribed above the entry are the words 'Orthae Delmah d'lil
Eldalie Quar'valsharess'. The walls of smoothed marble echo
whispers of the name 'Hanali' in your ears.{x

55204.name: {wHallway in the Temple{x
description: The  hallway  leads  north  and  south.
North leads further into the temple and
the hallway seems to make  a sharp turn
to the east there.  South leads back to
the  moss covered  marble path outside.{x

55267.name: {BKarrickish {*Prison{x
description: {WDeeper blow the ground lies this cage, fitten out like a prison.  A
small bed and a drinking cup stand in the corner.  A plate with some
tainted meat lies in another corner.  {x

55140.name: {YS{ysin'urn {YD{yelmah{x {g({GB{geautiful {GH{gouse){x
description: {y
You enter the large building to find an emporium of elven-
crafted furniture. Everything looks hand crafted with great
care. Chairs and tables laced with {Yg{yold, {Ws{wi{*lv{we{Wr{y, and {Gj{gade{y,
beds made from {*ebony{y, shelves and dressers with very subtle
designs. Everything reeks of elvish beauty.{x

55104.name: {GAlong the Dense Vegetation{x
description: {g
You wander deeper and deeper into the lush vegetation and the
noises of the wild grow louder and louder. You can hear what
sounds like footsteps all about, rustling in the bushes to
either side of you.{x

55215.name: {gIn {GF{gront of the {GE{gastern {GE{gntrance{x
description: {g
North a few torches are burning, illuminating the hallway
inside the temple. The path leads towards the hallway and
to the west it leads back to the marble path. Now you are
close to the temple it seems that unlike it appeared from
afar it is only lightly damaged. The large pieces of debris
that lie shattered all over the roof came from the temple
south. Obviously this one is no longer used either, since
dust covers the walls and floor.{x

55297.name: {mT{Mh{we{Wa{wt{Mr{me{w - {yA{Yu{yd{wi{Wto{wr{yi{Yu{ym{x
description: You are in the auditorium of the Theater. From here you can
see perfectly what happens on the stage east. The red chairs
here look very comfortable. Two doors west lead back to the
foyer, where you can drink something during the break or the
after party. The auditorium is illuminated by a large number
of candlelights, that magically flicker and float here.{x

55171.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gThe ground here is heavily trampled down. It would almost{x
{gseem as if a group of horses galloped through here. The {x
{gimprints however show large three-toed feet. Trees are {x
{gbroken in half, as well as some of the stone debris.{x

55296.name: {mT{Mh{we{Wa{wt{Mr{me{w - {yF{Yo{Wy{Ye{yr{x
description: In the foyer is a large bar, a wardrobe and a reception,
where you can buy tickets for the play you wish to see.
The wardrobe seems to be closed. A beautiful red carpet
leads east, where a guard is checking the tickets. West
leads to the exit and a few tables and chairs sit near
the bar. {x

55103.name: {GPeaceful Entrance to the Dense Forest{x
description: {g
The foliage begins to thicken as you enter into the dense
forest. You can hear things ruffling around you in the
surrounding bushes. Erie howls and fast sounding rustles
begin to surround you. {x

55228.name: {wDu{*ng{weo{*n{x
description: A small room filled with cobweb and dust. A few corpses sit in the
corner. Thirteen skulls lie in a circle, with in the center a large
candle. A few fingernails lie around it.{x

55195.name: {WThe {CN{corthern {CP{co{Bo{bl {Wof {GR{gefreshing{x
description: {g
Near the northern wall of the room lies a pedestal made of
marble, on top lies a tome. A warm glow emanates from a
pool in the center, shimmering with its blue glow from the
depths of the pool.{x

55181.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
You come across a bridge over a small creak winding through
the forest. The water in the stream has grown green and has
become stagnant. Red algey grows and peaks from the water. {x

55281.name: {gA Dense Swamp{x
description: {c
A thick green mist rises from the deep swamp. It is not very
smart to stay here long, it is easy to get stuck here. A few
small streams come from the south and east here and together
they continue to the north, as a small brook.{x

55293.name: {wEn{*d o{wf t{*he {wHa{*ll{wwa{*y{x
description: The hallway suddenly ends, the black walls show no doors.
A long table has been broken in half and what was on it
now is spread on the ground. A pool of dried up blood lies
close to a skeleton that rests against the eastern wall.
More bones are scattered through the hallway. Under the
broken table is a hatch.{x

55286.name: {wSe{*cr{wet {*Hi{wde{*ou{wt{x
description: The dark hallway leads further east, slowly descending
deeper into the earth. A few skeletons lie on the ground,
some almost intact. The air here is a bit stale.{x

55147.name: Ruins of True Mount Storage Room
description: {W This is the storage room for a mount shop in the Ruins of Tru, you
will find nothing here, please leave.  {x

55259.name: {wA {gG{Gr{wa{Ws{Gs{gy F{Gi{We{Gl{gd{x
description: {gThe small dirtpath turns south, towards a lovely wooden cottage
where any guests can sleep.  West is a beautiful garden and a clear
blue lake can be seen northwest.  East leads back to the warm
campfire.  {x

55136.name: {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{* turns West{x
description: {g
The silence of the forest begins to drown out the sounds
from the market place as you can hear things moving around
you in the bushes. You also hear birds tweeting above you
in the branches of the trees.{x

55148.name: {*Zirn lu' Ssrig'luin{g ({GF{geed and {GN{geed){x
description: {g
You enter this fairly large supply store, and notice they
have almost everything you could need. Its hard to believe
such a store could exist in such a small town. {x

55163.name: {GP{gath around a {GH{guge {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
{gThings grow increasingly silent as you continue to move to {x
{gthe north. The debris is still quite heavy. You notice some {x
{gsmaller debris is stuck in the tops of damaged trees.{x

55180.name: {GI{gntersection near the {GR{guined {GT{gemple{x
description: {g
You reach an intersection with a path leading towards the
inner sanctum. You can see a few spirits dancing about the
ground, and light coming from the sanctum west. The path
continues to the north, where a second temple can be seen.{x

55266.name: {BKarrickish {*Dungeon{x
description: {WThis dungeon lies deep below the ground.  East is a large closed
and locked door.  Some water drips down from the dirt ceiling.  The
floor is all muddy.  {x

55262.name: {WA {gP{Ge{ga{wc{We{gf{Gu{gl {gS{Gp{Wo{gt{x
description: {gA white hammock has been hung here between two large trees.  This
seems to be the place where Azarot sleeps.  On the ground grows grass
and alot of flowers.  East stands a large oak tree.  To all other
directions the foreste is too dense to pass.  {x

55275.name: {GDeeper in the Forest{x
description: {g
A few tracks of animals are visible in the mud. The trees
here are very green and look healty. West a small bridge can
be seen and the sound of flowing water comes from there.{x

55130.name: {YL{yuent {YR{yevis{x
description: {g
The road leads on through the dense woods to the east. To
the south there is a stable, you can smell it from quite
far a way. To the north there is an elvish armor shop,
probably selling all sorts of mithril goodies.{x

55156.name: {YL{y' {YZ{y'Hin {YU{ylu {*S{ws{Wuss{wu{*n{x
description: {g
By now most of the spirits are gone, and there are a few
rocks that look as if they are from a building of some
sort, maybe the temple north. Most of the makou lamps have
been destroyed as well.{x

55101.name: {WB{wroken {WS{wheltered {WP{wath{x
description: {g
Thought clear overhead the dense forest soon swallows the
openings and becomes dense to either side of you. The light
coming through the canopy turns an almost eerie green as
the mist from the damp ground rises.{x

55280.name: (no short description)~

F par ABCDEFGHIJK

55244.name: Nytri~
description:
{WThis young lady, from elvish origin, sells all kinds of beautiful
dresses and tunics.  A small nametag says 'Nytri'.  As you enter, she
beams at you.  {x
55244.room_name: {WA small elven lady is dusting off the dresses and tunics.{x

55100.name: a {MV{mectorian {xguard~
description:
Adorned in vectorian garb the guard stands ever ready for any
present danger wandering about.
55100.room_name: A guard wearing the mark of {MV{mector{x stands here.

55101.name: Teltaya~
description:
Moping about, Teltaya seems to have lots all life in her, as she
longly stairs out the window as if expecting someone to arive home.
55101.room_name: A blond elven woman stiches up some cloths in her rocker by the window.

55102.name: Kyrban~
description:
Kyrban, a kind and gentle elven man, standing tall and proud with a
rather sad look in his eye.  Sence his loss he has never been the
same.
55102.room_name: A tall elven man, with long silver hair studies his books in the corner.

55103.name: Meikaela the furniture dealer~
description:
Don't get to close to her she will talk your ear off.  This young
girl is way to hyperactive for her own good.  Although she seems to be
making quite a number of sales and has quite a selection.
55103.room_name: An over zelous young girl runs about the shop showing people diffrent pieces of funiture.

55104.name: Mayla~
description:
A pretty young girl stands here behind the counter, looking very
very bored.  On her shirt she carries a nametage "Mayla".
55104.room_name: A girl stands at the counter looking very bored and wearing the nametag "Mayla".

55105.name: Hayann~
description:
A handsome boy standing near the counter, packing a few boxes with
clothes.  On his shirt he is wearing the nametag "Hayann".
55105.room_name: A young boy stands at a counter packing boxes.

55106.name: Kaylin~
description:
A probably not so bright girl, dressed in a bathing suit and
playing with her hair stands at the counter.  She wears a colorful
nametag saying "Kaylin".
55106.room_name: {WA blonde girl stands behind the counter in a bathing suit twirling her hair on her finger.{x

55107.name: Elderot~
description:
This male elf probably already had a few too much.  Each time he
hands out wine samples to the customers, he takes one himself.  A
nametag on the counter says "Elderot".
55107.room_name: {WA very merry looking elf stands behind the counter handing out wine samples and taking a few for himself.{x

55108.name: Llavin~
description:
An older elf wanders around his shop, looking for new gifts in the
numerous boxes here.  He carries a nametag saying "Llavin".
55108.room_name: A man stands here with a large grin selling gifts for everyone.

55109.name: Yevvea~
description:
This beautiful and well dressed lady is always there to help you
with selecting the best outfits for your wedding.  She gathers her
clothes from all over the realm, just for you.
55109.room_name: {WA nicely dressed lady walks about the room helping people find their perfect wedding outfits.{x

55110.name: Gaylann~
description:
This elven man dressed in simple robes stands in his shop to help
his customers find what they need.  He carries a nametag on his shirt
that says "Gaylann".
55110.room_name: A man stands here helping customers find what they need.

55111.name: {wa {yF{Yr{yi{we{Wn{wd{Yl{yy {YA{yn{Yn{wo{Wu{wn{yc{Ye{yr{x~
description:
{yThis beautiful human female is announcing the great shows in the
local theather.  Famous artists and actors from all over the realm
play here.  {x 
{x
55111.room_name: {wa {yF{Yr{yi{we{Wn{wd{Yl{yy {yF{Ye{wm{Wa{Yl{ye {YA{yn{Yn{wo{Wu{wn{yc{Ye{yr{W is telling everybody about tonights show.{x

55112.name: the cute {ysq{Yu{wi{Wr{Yr{yel{x~

{yA cute squirrel hops from acorn to acorn.  From time to time it
suddenly stops, looking around innocently.  When it has gathered
enough acorns it sprints back to its tree.  {x
55112.room_name: {WA little cute {ysq{Yu{wi{Wr{Yr{yel{W is gathering acorns here.{x

55113.name: a wonderful yellow {ybu{Yt{wt{We{wr{Yf{yly{x~

{yThe wonderulf butterfly flies from flower to flower, attracted by
their scent.  Its wings have a yellow patern.  {x

This strong elven man is famous for his powerful swords and other
weapons.  He wears leather clothes, that protect him against the
sparks.  A nametag says 'Riyua'.
55115.room_name: {WA smiling elven man stands here, dusting off a few daggers.{x

55116.name: {wt{Wh{we {Wwa{wnd{Wer{win{Wg S{wpi{Wri{wt o{Wf a {wfa{Wll{wen {WHe{wro{x~

{wThis is the spirit of someone that died inside one of the temples. 
Its soul couldn't find rest and returned as spirit, trapped inside
this dimension.  {x

55117.name: Iloyan~
description:
This pretty elven man is the baker of this village.  He also export
his food to near villages.  He wears a nametag saying "Iloyan".
55117.room_name: {WA beautiful elven man stands here in his bakery.{x

55118.name: Zoliya~
description:
This human female sells all kind of wedding stuff, which she
gathers from all over the realm.  She is wearing a beautiful dress,
with lovely decorations.  A small nametag says "Zoliya".

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
55118.room_name: {WA beautiful woman stands behind the counter here.{x

55119.name: {YT{yorial{W, the stable owner{x~

This short dwarf cleans the stables and cares for the various
animals here.  Around his neck he carries a nametag that says
'Torial'.
55119.room_name: {WA short dwarf walks around, cleaning the stables.{x
55119.keywords: Torial stable owner small dwarf truquest~

55120.name: a{wn h{*u{wg{*e {wW{*a{wr M{*a{wm{*m{wo{*t{wh{x~
description:
{wThis armored War Mammoth looks like a great support and a
formidable opponent.  With its powerful trunk and tusks it can
practically keep anyone at a safe distance.  Though not fighters by
nature, these Mammoths will protect their master as good as they
55120.room_name: {wAn h{*u{wg{*e {wW{*a{wr M{*a{wm{*m{wo{*t{wh{W guards his master here.{x

55121.name: a {ww{Wh{wi{Wt{we {WW{wo{Wl{wf{x~
description:
{wThis artic wolf comes from the lands of Icewind Dale.  It is used
to extreme coldness, but it can survive also in warmer climates.  This
fearless warrior will protect her master with her life.  {x

55122.name: {*a {RM{ra{*d {RM{ro{*nk{re{Ry{x~
description:
{*Altho not a fighter by nature, this monkey is very useful because
of his speed.  Do not underestimate this creature, it will guard his
master and pop up while you least expect it.  {x
55122.room_name: {*a {RM{ra{*d {RM{ro{*nk{re{Ry{* walks around freely, close to his master.{x

55123.name: {MA{mmiria{W, the female armorer{x~
description:
{WThis young smiling elven woman sells all kinds of armor.  She
swings the hammer with quite some force, trying to remove some dents
from an old piece of armor.  On her clothes she wears a nametag
'Amiria'.  {x
55123.room_name: {WA smiling elven woman stands here, removing the dents from some old armor.{x

55124.name: {*P{wotimiar{W, the tall and fat dwarf{x~
description:
{wThis tall and fat dwarf wears a nametag saying 'Potimiar'.  He runs
a food supply store, the biggest in town.  He wears expensive clothes.
55124.room_name: {WA tall and fat dwarf stand behind the counter.{x

55125.name: {YK{yolina{W, the jeweller{x~
description:
{WThis well-groomed elven lady runs a small jewelry shop.  She is
polishing some rings at the moment.  She has beauty of the race, but
small signs show that this lady is very very old.  {x
55125.room_name: {WA well-groomed elven lady stands here, polishing some rings.{x

55126.name: {Wa cute {wB{Wu{wn{Wn{wy{x~
description:
This cute bunny hops around the grassy field.  It can find enough
stuff to eat here and seems to feel at home.  Its soft white fur
shines with health.
55126.d_flags: D {Wlooks at you with its innocent eyes for the last time. Shame on you!{x~

55127.name: {wa {cL{wa{yr{wg{ce {cD{yr{wa{yg{co{yn{wf{yl{cy{x~
description:
{cThese large dragonflies live around a pond nearby. Altho their 
smaller brothers and sisters have beautiful and fragile wings, these 
creatures have very powerful ones. They can easily kill a cow alone.{x

55128.name: {GT{golin{x~
description:
This bartender provides everybody with drinks.  He looks very
handsome and the girls really like him.

{*Acolytes are human beings that have given themself to Myrkul, as a
last way to prevent their complete death.  They view the possibility
of becoming undead as the ultimate rewards for their service to

55134.name: Acolyte Maker~

55135.name: {*a bride mannequin{x~
description: {x
55135.room_name: {*A mannequin dressed like a bride stands here.{x

55136.name: {RM{re{wn{*d{ro{Rr{x~

{wThis short dwarf used to be a very skilled horseshoer.  Now he just
sits here, drinking his beer, wine and the local specialities.  He
wears some old filty clothes, that must have been pretty expensive
when just new.  {x
55136.room_name: {wA short dwarf sits here, looking around.{x

55137.name: {cR{wu{yt{*i{ci{x~

{wBoth muscled and heavy, this man is not someone you want to fight
with.  He is a shoemaker, on of the best in the realm.  He makes

{CA muscled and very experienced troll hides here.  In his hands he

and one ear has been chopped off.  He is the elite of the Karrickish

55138.room_name: {WA muscled troll hides here, holding a dagger and wearing a {BKarrickish{W cloak{x

55139.name: {Wthe {BKarrickish{W Guerilla Leader{x~

{CA tall muscled and very experienced troll stands here proudly.  His
body is covered with scars.  In his hands he holds a long and sharp
dagger, ready to attack.  He is the leader of the elite of the
Karrickish soldiers.  {x
55139.room_name: {WA tall muscled troll hides here, holding a sharp dagger and wearing a {BKarrickish{W cloak.{x
